desc: GLO Science is a New York City based dental company dedicated to building healthy smiles through innovative technological advances in oral care. Invented by world-renowned dentist and oral health expert, Dr. Jonathan B. Levine, GLO is transforming the way dental professionals and patients approach teeth whitening and

layout.text: The best professional teeth whitening program available. Period.
Grow your dental practice with the teeth whitening system that's easy to administer and provides the ultimate patient and clinical team experience. Now in only 16 minutes total treatment time!
